name: Vanno
summary: Vanno computes the CDS and protein level effect of genetic variants
short_description:
Vanno maps genetic variants given in chromosomal coordinates to relevant transcripts and computes the effect on the coding and protein sequence. Effects are returned in HGVS nomenclature where applicable.

Example:
  chr6:30558477A>GA
maps to the ENSEMBL transcript ENST00000326195 (among others), a coding transcript for the gene ABCF1, it inserts an 'A' into the last codon (stop codon), that change on the CDS level would be c.2538_2539insA, and on the protein level it would be a synonymous stop-to-stop variant, p.Ter846Ter.
